description: Variation of condition 1 of listed building consent dated 26th June 2018 (RN 18/03054/LBC) for the Variation of condition 1 of listed building consent dated 9 April 2018 (RN: 17/09631/LBC) which itself varied condition 1 of listed building consent dated 26 May 2017 (RN: 17/01299/LBC) for internal and external alterations associated with the reconfiguration and change of use of the property to provide four residential units at the upper floors and reconfiguration of the retail space at ground and lower ground floors; replacement satellite dish and aerial at roof level. Installation of new shop windows and awnings to shopfront (North Audley Street) and corner entrance. Associated internal and external alterations in connection within the residential use and the retail (Class A1) use at ground and lower ground floors. NAMELY revised minor modifications to the consented scheme including change to the proposed internal stair/opening, additional stud wall to form provision for existing and additional WC, replacement of fanlight with MVHR grille to external lightwell door and reduction to single condenser unit.
decision_conditions: Dvpmt in accordance with approvd plans
